name: Crusher's Curse
description:
Crusher's Curse is a 2d platformer with 'curse' mechanic, which changes your moveset for certain key.

This is one of those I Wanna Fangames, and it's intended to be enjoyable by beginners.

[Features]

  •  Unique manuever using the curse mechanic
  •  40 Stages of crushin' platforming
  •  In-game tutorial for those who never played I Wanna Fangames before
